current_contact.agency: Nevada Cnty Coroners OfcArkansas Crime Lab

case_circumstances: This victim was found at Pand N. W. Railroad in a railroad car (#59-29-56) that was used for wood chips only. This victim would have gained access to the railroad car in Pine Bluff, Arkansas, Arkadelphia, Arkansas, or Gurdon, Arkansas. But it is believed to be in Pine Bluff, Arkansas between June 3, 1983 - June 11, 1983.
case_head_hair: Red-brown hair measuring less than 1 inch.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_with_body: 1 pair of yellow shorts-Made in the USA, 2 white socks with 2 blue stripes and 1 yellow stripe, 1 pair of light blue trousers, 1 pale yellow 38" elastic belt, and 1 pair of gray to blue slacks-size large and labeled "Menswear by Silver label-Nulook Fashion.
